currentPositions.description: Encompass Health is the largest owner and operator of rehabilitation hospitals in the United States. With a national footprint that includes 157 hospitals in 37 states and Puerto Rico, the Company provides high-quality, compassionate rehabilitative care for patients recovering from a major injury or illness, using advanced technology and innovative treatments to maximize recovery.
currentPositions.title: President and Chief Executive Officer, Director

headline: President and Chief Executive Officer, Encompass Health

ingestedContentSummary.description: Encompass Health President and CEO Mark Tarr shares his latest quarterly message with employees, providing an overview of Encompass Health's first-quarter pe...
ingestedContentSummary.title: Q1 2024 Quarterly Connection with Mark Tarr | Encompass Health

message.text:
My latest quarterly update video includes an overview of Encompass Health's first-quarter performance with a focus on our marketing and business development efforts, including a preview of our new Patient Choice campaign. I hope you’ll take a few minutes to watch.

https://ehc.rehab/3whdwZa

ingestedContentSummary.description: Patients can make huge functional gains in short periods of time using the right technology. Case study: Darion Roberts
ingestedContentSummary.title: Patient Success Story: Darion Roberts

message.text:
I never tire of reading inspiring patient success stories. Karina Haisten, the director of therapy operations at Encompass Health Rehabilitation Hospital of Waco in Texas, shared a great one recently. Take a few minutes to read Karina’s blog post to learn how Darion Roberts went from being completely dependent when he entered our Waco hospital to regaining his independence and returning home with the help of innovative technologies and compassionate, expert care.

https://ehc.rehab/3VicTsH

ingestedContentSummary.description: Becker's is thrilled to name 75 hospital and health system chief pharmacy officers.
ingestedContentSummary.title: 75 hospital and health system chief pharmacy officers to know | 2024

message.text:
Encompass Health's VP of Pharmacy and Ancillary Clinical Services Shawn Myers has been recognized as one of Becker's Hospital Review’s '75 Hospital and Health System Chief Pharmacy Officers to Know' for 2024. I’m thankful to have Shawn leading our pharmacy and respiratory care professionals. Congratulations, Shawn!

https://ehc.rehab/48Qx8R7

ingestedContentSummary.description: Encompass Health offers opportunities for physicians to lead an interdisciplinary therapy team focused completely on patients, plus access to the most advanced rehabilitation technology.
ingestedContentSummary.title: Physician Opportunities - Inpatient Rehabilitation | Encompass Health

message.text:
It’s National Doctors’ Day, and I’d like to take this opportunity to recognize the skilled physicians practicing in Encompass Health hospitals across the country. We couldn’t achieve our clinical outcomes without the outstanding care you provide to our patients.

If you’re interested in pursuing a career in rehabilitative medicine with Encompass Health, visit our physician opportunities page.

https://ehc.rehab/4adPDA9

ingestedContentSummary.description: With more older adults with chronic conditions, rural communities need access to inpatient rehabilitation. Here's how we're helping them get it.
ingestedContentSummary.title: Closing Healthcare Gaps in Rural Communities

message.text: Did you know that approximately 20% of the U.S. population lives in a rural area, according to the latest U.S. Census data? That includes one quarter of all Medicare beneficiaries. These patients are far less likely to have access to care at an inpatient rehabilitation facility after a stroke, traumatic brain injury or other condition requiring rehabilitation. Learn about Encompass Health’s efforts to meet patients’ needs and provide jobs for healthcare workers in rural communities.

ingestedContentSummary.description: Encompass Health Corp. (NYSE: EHC) today announced preliminary plans to build a freestanding, 60-bed inpatient rehabilitation hospital in Avondale, Arizona. The hospital will be located within The...
ingestedContentSummary.title: Encompass Health announces preliminary plans to build a 60-bed inpatient rehabilitation hospital in Avondale, Arizona - Encompass Health Connect

message.text:
Encompass Health recently announced plans to build our seventh hospital in Arizona. The freestanding, 60-bed hospital will be located in Avondale, bringing inpatient rehabilitation services to patients in Maricopa County. 

https://ehc.rehab/43fsOK9

ingestedContentSummary.description: Speech therapy can play an important role in inpatient rehabilitation. Learn why and how SLPs help patients and providers in this setting.
ingestedContentSummary.title: Speech Therapy in Inpatient Rehabilitation

message.text: Nicole Link, lead speech therapist at Mount Carmel Rehabilitation Hospital, an affiliate of Encompass Health, has written an insightful article about the importance of speech therapy in inpatient rehabilitation. I hope you’ll take a few minutes to learn why speech therapy is an integral component of Encompass Health’s interdisciplinary approach.

ingestedContentSummary.description: Mario Berenguer details what it was like to have a massive stroke and how Encompass Health helped him recover and get back his life.
ingestedContentSummary.title: Stroke Recovery Story: Mario Berenguer

message.text: Do you ever wonder what it’s like to be a patient at an Encompass Health hospital? Mario Berenguer was kind enough to share experiences from his stroke recovery journey at Encompass Health Rehabilitation Hospital of Panama City in Florida. I encourage you to share his story with friends or loved ones who may be considering our level of care.
